column4: Can anyone help me with getting media support (MP3, MPEG, DVD etc) support installed on a PC which has no internet connection?
I did download the ubuntu-restricted-extras .deb file, but I am not sure if I have downloaded all the dependent packages...
... is there any Wiki page that lists all the dependencies of ubuntu-restricted-extras - not just the immediate ones?
Not a Wiki page, but if you go to packages.ubuntu.com and search for ubuntu-restricted-extras it'll probably give you what you want
